CAST:
**CAST**(`expr` AS `type`)
- `expr` (mixed) => Value to cast
- `type` (string) => Datatype to cast to

returns: mixed

Cast a value as a certain type
CONVERT:

- `type` (string) => Datatype to cast to

- `transcoding_name` (string) => Character set to convert to

returns: mixed

_**System Function**_

Cast a value as a certain type
